search.message: I write some articles to share with my (fresh) colleagues in my spare time. But most of them written by Turkish language.

register.title: Register
register.paragh1: I know, it's ridiculous but I wanted to make an user service.
register.paragh2: You can join here to my service, don't worry also you have an option for delete every own information.
register.notEmpty: This place can not be empty.
register.minLength5: Username length cannot be less than 5
register.maxLength20: Username length cannot be greater than 20
register.requiredEmail: This place is for email only.
register.notMatch: The passwords you entered do not match.
register.minLength8: Password length cannot be less than 5
register.maxLength20Pass: Password length cannot be greater than 20

login.title: Login
login.paragh1: Welcome again, Login and read easily.
login.error: Username or Email Address or password is wrong.

notification.title: Notification Settings
notification.span1: If someone tries to sign in more than 3 times, send me a notification.
notification.span2: I want to be notified every time I log in.
notification.span3: I want to be notified when new article added.
notification.span4: I want to be notified when change my password.

visibility.title: Visibility Settings
visibility.span1: Do not show my contact address.
visibility.span2: Do not show my birth date.
visibility.span3: Do not show my github address
visibility.span4: Do not show my linkedin address

comment.title: Comments
comment.info: Please fill the text if you send a comment.

error.message: Hey! We are sorry for what you are looking for. If you think this is a real problem, please message me. I will fix it as soon as possible.
error.name: Name

contact.title: Contact
contact.message: If you want to contact me, please filling out the fields below. If you wish, you can also reach me at me@kayafirat.com.
contact.name: Name
